original_text: The children gather wood, and the fathers kindle the fire, and the women knead their dough, to make cakes to the queen of heaven, and to pour out drink offerings unto other gods, that they may provoke me to anger.
korean_text: 자식들은 나무를 줍고 아버지들은 불을 피우며 부녀들은 가루를 반죽하여 하늘의 여왕을 위하여 과자를 만들며 그들이 또 다른 신들에게 전제를 부음으로 나의 노를 일으키느니라

sentences.original_text: and the fathers kindle the fire
and the women knead their dough
to make cakes to the queen of heaven
and to pour out drink offerings unto other gods
that they may provoke me to anger
